name: Joe (Tronic Verlag/CP Verlag)
overview: Joe is a platform game created by Ronald Mayer and released in both Computronic 1987/03-04, and in Magic Disk 64 1988/05. In it you play the dog Joe, who must avoid the alligators, piranha fish and other baddies like the birdie, cuttie (scissors) and jumper and make your way across the board, turning all the tiles green in order to get to the next level.
